**Mechanical Maintenance Services for RCMP Maidstone Detachment, SK**

**Reference Number**: cb-922-87718807
**Solicitation Number**: M5000-22-4298/A
**Publication Date**: May 31, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: July 2, 2024, at 4:00 PM
**Bid Status**: Expired

**Description**:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide mechanical maintenance services for the RCMP Maidstone Detachment, Saskatchewan. The contract period is 24 months, with an option to extend for two additional 12-month periods.

**Scope of Work**:
The selected contractor will be responsible for performing preventative mechanical maintenance on all temperature control systems and environmental mechanical systems at the detachment.

**Security Requirements**:
A security clearance is required for this contract.

**Evaluation Criteria**:
Tenders will be evaluated based on the following criteria: compliance with bid requirements, mandatory technical evaluation criteria, and lowest evaluated price.

**Submission Requirements**:
Tenders must be submitted electronically to NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The bid documents, including the tender notice and annexes, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Notices and Consultations**:
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting the GETS website for updates and amendments.

**Integrity Regime**:
The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, which applies to all contracting activities. Bidders must comply with the integrity provisions outlined in the bid documents.

**Indigenous Procurement**:
Canada encourages bidders to register for the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase their visibility and be eligible for contracts set aside for Indigenous businesses.

**Contact Information**:
For more information, please contact Qyitayo Ziwa, Procurement Officer, at (306) 625-4151 or Qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
